english_example_sentence: We had always supported our friends in difficult times.
russian_example_sentence: Мы всегда поддерживали наших друзей в трудные времена.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz, arkadaşlarımıza zor zamanlarda her zaman desteklemiştik.
